title: Captain James T. Kirk
subtitle: Captain of the U.S.S. Enterprise
author: Tom W. Hartung
card_content_html: Captain Kirk's image shows he is decisive, out-going, practical, and cool under pressure. These preferences are typical in leaders — but being a highly respected boss that people feel good about following takes a bit more.
card_first_person_html:
The profiles and images of the three main characters in Star Trek were among the first I did back in the 1980s, so it makes sense they should be the first posted on this site.

Initially, it was a bit surprising to see how similar Captain Kirk's imge is to Mr. Spock's. It's also interesting to see how these portraits show Kirk is more outgoing — one of the qualities which helps make him a good leader.
